extendedInfo.description: Korean Hangul Handwriting for Kids!Helps teach Hangul, the Korean alphabet, for students of all ages! Whether a beginner or an expert, our Finger Tracingâ¢ Apps help teach Korean Hangul characters.With arrows or without arrows to help you learn at your own pace, students will learn the proper way to write the Hangul alphabet.â Does not test for accuracyâ Free Ad-supported versionâ Language/Speech and Sounds: Japanese â Age Level: 1+â Title: Korean Alphabet Hangul Handwriting For Kidsâ Copyright 2012 TeachersParadise.com, Inc.

reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.comment: Learn real quickly, and no problems yet so fairly great app.
reviews.author: Karina Alonso

reviews.title: Great way to practice Korean letters
reviews.comment: Can\'t beat this app to practice and memorize Korean alphabet. It allows you to practice the correct strokes and pronunciation.  It would be great it there was a chart of all letters and some quizzes,  but maybe in a future update.
reviews.author: C Young

reviews.title: Sounds in Korean are totally wrong
reviews.comment: I\'m sitting here trying the app with my Korean friend and she cannot believe how inaccurate all the sounds are. I don\'t know where they got the sound files from but they certainly haven\'t been checked with a native Korean speaker. This app is kind of OK for practicing the writing element only... but if you wanna actually associate the correct sounds with the letters you are writing then you\'d better get something else or risk learning totally wrong Korean.
reviews.author: Ross Ensbey

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Awesome app. Love the pronunciation help as well. Good for anybody who us trying to learn Hangul.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!! Wonderful!! ^^
reviews.comment: Wow! This app is so wonderful and amazing! It really helps me alot thanks^^

reviews.title: Dull but serves purpose
reviews.comment: Shows the strokes but very dull and could use a testing mode.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I am a beginner. It helps me a lot. I learn the basic from here and now I can read hangul. Gamsahamida..!! :-)

reviews.title: Useful :-)

reviews.title: Nice app...updates needed
reviews.comment: I gave it 4 stars because the app is great for writing practice but the pronunciations are off and it would be nice if there were some additional features like combined vowels and consonants

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This app. Is really help me to know more about korean language... I love this app. Excellent job for the team and staff that did this application for korean fans.

reviews.title: Hangul letters
reviews.comment: ,,,easy to learn,really a big help for me,,

reviews.title: Who knew?

reviews.comment: There is one small bug on trace write or symbol without trace help.  Otherwise it is correct form of writing.
